page.title: 08Whalley Abbey Fellowship
page.content: The abbey attracts many thousands of visitors each year who come to view the well maintained ruins and gardens. The{WHALLEY ABBEY FELLOWSHIP}is responsible for raising funds to look after these.They need to raise{Â£3000 {per year,}which is{15%}of the total cost. The money is raised by the{Craft {Shop,}which also sells souvenirs, sweets and drinks.Money is also raised from fetes,open days,cheese+wine evenings,coffee mornings and other social events. Fellowship members also man the gatehouse, a charge of 50p goes towards the gardener's wages.{ { Membership}of the fellowship consists of{ordinary people}throughout Lancashire and beyond who want to help {tourists}to enjoy the Abbey,and to support the work of the conference house by buying equipment.
